org.liris.smartgov.simulator.urban.osm.scenario

Class GenericOsmScenario<Tnode extends OsmNode,Troad extends Road>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.liris.smartgov.simulator.core.scenario.Scenario
      • org.liris.smartgov.simulator.urban.osm.scenario.GenericOsmScenario<Tnode,Troad>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BasicOsmScenario, RandomTrafficScenario, ScenarioVisualization

    public abstract class GenericOsmScenario<Tnode extends OsmNode,Troad extends Road>
extends Scenario
    Abstract base for OSM scenarios. Define functions to load OSM features parsed from input files.

    Nodes and arcs will be loaded respectively from nodes and roads file entries of the configuration file.

    Corresponding files should be json files as given in output of the SmartGovOsmParser.

      • buildArcs

        public java.util.Collection<? extends Arc> buildArcs(SmartGovContext context)
        Loads osm roads from the roads json file specified in the configuration, and generates arcs accordingly thanks to the OsmArcBuilder.

        Loaded roads are added to the input OsmContext.

        Specified by:
        buildArcs in class Scenario
        Parameters:
        context - current context
        Returns:
        collection of generated OsmArcss
